Docs.summary: A Class representing an AppPlatformServiceRegistry along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct an from an instance of using the GetAppPlatformServiceRegistryResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetAppPlatformServiceRegistry method.
